title: Factoring the denominator
text: The three denominators in factored form are $$2x=2x$$, $$4x=2\times2 x$$, and $$4=2\times2$$.
speech: The three denominators in factored form are  2 x is equal to, 2 x ,  4 x is equal to, 2 times 2 x, , and  4 is equal to 2 times 2 .

title: Find LCD
text: The LCD is the smallest expression that is divisible by each one of the denominators.
speech: The LCD is the smallest expression that is divisible by each one of the denominators.
